18#include "lib.h"
19
20#include "crc.h"
21
22/* Calculate an endian-independent CRC of supplied buffer */
23uint32_t calc_crc(uint32_t initial, const void *buf, uint32_t size)
24{
25 static const uint32_t crctab[] = {
26 0x00000000, 0x1db71064, 0x3b6e20c8, 0x26d930ac,
27 0x76dc4190, 0x6b6b51f4, 0x4db26158, 0x5005713c,
28 0xedb88320, 0xf00f9344, 0xd6d6a3e8, 0xcb61b38c,
29 0x9b64c2b0, 0x86d3d2d4, 0xa00ae278, 0xbdbdf21c
30 };
31 uint32_t i, crc = initial;
32 const uint8_t *data = (const uint8_t *) buf;
33
34 for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
35 crc ^= *data++;
36 crc = (crc >> 4) ^ crctab[crc & 0xf];
37 crc = (crc >> 4) ^ crctab[crc & 0xf];
38 }
39 return crc;
40}
41
